input_args.text: 'Go to Article Donald Trump will respect our nation’s secrets and intelligence , unlike his former opponent. Two intelligence sources confirmed that the President’s Daily Brief, or PDB, is now available to President-elect Trump. President Obama directed that the winner of the election is to have full access to the material, to ensure a smooth transition. Watch the video: Watch the latest video at video.foxnews.com Amy Moreno is a Published Author , Pug Lover & Game of Thrones Nerd. You can follow her on Twitter here and Facebook here . Support the Trump Presidency and help us fight Liberal Media Bias. Please LIKE and SHARE this story on Facebook or Twitter. '
